column2: ENGLISH
I am out in the woods, and I see a mighty stag while my party is hunting.
I know people are out to kill me, and they are after me while I hunt.
I got him while he hunts.
I managed to injure him on the latest hunt.
I thought I was finally able to kill him.
What?? My Liege has killed me
A white hart has been seen in the north of [Root.Location.GetName]. I am told it is a hart of ten and the biggest deer ever seen.
The dogs have caught scent of a boar in the forest. This is the chance of getting a mighty boar slain.
Our hunting party has cornered a large bear. A small argument amongst the hunters regarding who should get to kill the bear has nearly turned into a brawl.
The hounds were more alert this morning than I've ever seen before. Something stupendous must be awaiting us.
The hounds have torn a small child of a peasant to pieces. This may tarnish our reputation slightly.
While chasing an agile deer my horse stumbled and broke his leg. Luckily, I was thrown off, but now my horse is in pain...
The sighthounds thirsted for blood this gentle afternoon and they brought us many hares.
My lack of hunting skill is becoming quite obvious. My court is talking about my failure in not so quite quiet voices.
I am such a good hunter that I do not always need my retinue when I hunt. There is a large pack of wolves ahead, and they look hungry.
I've taken down a large deer on my own. My skill is legendary in [Root.Location.GetName], but my liege is not always as skillful as I am.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is boasting about how much better a hunter [From.GetSheHe] is, compared to you, just because [From.GetSheHe] killed a large deer on [From.GetHerHis] own.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is such a humble vassal, giving me the honor of [From.GetHerHis] kill from the hunt. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a benefit to my rule, and [From.GetHerHis] humility is an example to us all.
I have given the order for a Grand Hunt to be organized in [Root.Location.GetName].
War disrupts our Grand Hunt. We are forced to cancel our activities.
The Grand Hunt is over for now. This was a truly noble endeavour and a true challenge for our martial abilities.

It is a perfect opportunity - my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has invited both me and my rival to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] hunt in the forests of [Root.Liege.Location.GetName]. A small mistake can have devastating consequences, an arrow released at the wrong time might pierce through my rival's heart...
I heard the arrow the second before it hit. The whirring noise its feather made as it sang its way through the forest should have made it easier to avoid it...
I held my breath as the arrow left the bow, willed my eyes to stay open and follow its path. It was aimed directly at [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I was sure the arrow would hit true...

The arrow struck true, piercing [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heart and [From.GetSheHe] was dead before [From.GetSheHe] fell off the horse. No one wanted to admit whose arrow killed [From.GetTitledFirstName] and so [From.GetTitledFirstName] death became a sad hunting accident.
My father [Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName]'s hunting accident was no accident. [From.GetTitledFirstName], my father's rival, held the bow with the arrow that pierced my father's heart!
What are the odds?
Do nothing, I can't let them know that I know
I let the arrow fly and no one knows any better
The arrow struck but not quite where I wanted
But he got me first
He thought I wanted to kill him
I find no joy in killing such a proud animal
The peasants will finish it.
Just solve it already!
What are we waiting for? Let's go!
Make amends.
I will end his suffering myself
This is a fine sport!
Admit my failure.
I need more warm pelts for the winter.
Boast about your prowess!
[From.GetSheHeCap] can not hunt from the dungeon.
Thank [From.GetTitledFirstName]
I will find the White [Root.GetHuntingQuarryCap].
There is always next autumn...
I am proud of my hunting abilities.
It's now or never!
The arrow hit my arm!
...it hit [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s arm, wounding [From.GetHerHim]!
A perfect shot!
I will get my revenge, sooner than later!
A Stag? RUN AWAAAY
I must prepare an ambush
I will send out our best hunter.
I will face it alone with my spear.
Give me the bear spear!
I think my horse has a limp
Its just a peasant...
Huntsman, I need you!
Claim someone else's success as mine.
Maybe it's better to run....
Give [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] the Honor!
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Peasant, fire at my command!
The arrow pierced my leg!
...it hit [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s leg, maiming [From.GetHerHim]!
Spare its majesty
This is my kill.
Anyone but me, don't give it to me
I don't care what it is, we'll hunt it.
Let's just enjoy the hunt
The arrow... pierced my heart...
...the arrow missed [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
It would look really good above my fireplace
Let's do this another day
Another one? Isn't it enough now?
The arrow only grazed me
I was killed by my liege?
The White Stag
The hounds brings down the child of a peasant..
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] bribes [This.GetTitledFirstName] to shoot [Root.GetHerHis] rival with an arrow
[This.GetTitledFirstName] swears vengeance on [This.GetHerHis] father [This.Father.GetTitledFirstName]'s murderer [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] shot [Root.GetTitledFirstName] with an arrow!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] tried to shoot [Root.GetTitledFirstName] with an arrow!
The day did not bring any game at all, it had been a futile hunting trip with my guests and my face still burned with shame when the gamekeeper told me about deer parks.
Not good enough
Go ahead!
It will probably cost too much
It is an excellent idea!
I will find the White Stag.
I will find the White Bear.
I will find the White Tiger.
I will find the White Lion.
